description: The offences they are charged with are punishable by a fine or up to two years in prison.
title: Poland LGBT protests: Three charged with hanging rainbow flags off statues
title_page: Poland LGBT protests: Three charged with hanging rainbow flags off statues - BBC News
maintext: Last month, the EU said it would deny funding to six Polish towns that declared themselves "LGBT-free zones". Helena Dalli, the EU's commissioner for equality, tweeted: "EU values and fundamental rights must be respected by Member States and state authorities."
